name: Losing your stuff isn't fun y'know.
name_original: Losing your stuff isn't fun y'know.
description:
This is a dumb game about finding your key and bag after losing them.

It's nothing really special, I just made it when I was bored. I was also pretty curious how Bitsy worked so I consider this just a little first project to learn.

Oh, yeah it was made in Bitsy.
